name: Wipemart.com
tag_list: wipes, wet-wipes, cleaning, baby-wipes, household, lens-wipes, antibacterial, hand-wipes, auto-wipes, personal-care, pet-wipes, shoe-wipes, electronic-wipes
overview:
Wipemart.com is an online retailer of wipe products.

Founded in Schofield, Wisconsin, by Luke Burgess, Wipemart.com has a clean, easy-to-navigate layout, making it simple for customers to browse the various wipe products.

A unique pack quantity selector gives customers the freedom to order individual packs or multiple pack amounts with dynamically changing prices and imagery. The larger the pack amount, the larger the discount will be to the customer.
